S02ratnakeu:2257: saddharmadhārakāś ca gṛhasthapravrajitāḥ pudgalāḥ dharmapratipannāś ca rakṣitavyāḥ /
S02ratnakeu:2260: atha khalu kusumadhvajas tathāgatas tasyāṃ velāyām asya dharmaparyāyasya guṇānuśaṃsaprarūpaṇārtham evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2262: prapūjanāya nāyakeṣu saṃsṛjed ya eva tad /
S02ratnakeu:2263: idaṃ tu yaḥ pradhānasūtram uttamaṃ hi dhārayet
S02ratnakeu:2264: sa puṇyam aprameyam evam āpnuyād viśāradaḥ // RKP_13.1
S02ratnakeu:2265: atha khalu ratnacchatraśrīs tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2266: datvā svarṇaniṣkāṃ gaṃgānadīsikatopamāṃ munivṛṣabhebhyaḥ prāpnoti puṇyam evaṃ yathā samuddiśya sūtram idam //
S02ratnakeu:2267: atha khalu girikūṭas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2269: buddhebhyaḥ saṃpradadyāt pramuditasumanāḥ pūjanārthaṃ hi kaścit /
S02ratnakeu:2270: yaḥ paścāt kṣīṇakāle pratibhayarabhase dhārayet sūtram etat
S02ratnakeu:2271: puṇyasyāsya pramāṇaṃ na khalu kathayituṃ sarvasattvo 'pi śaktaḥ // RKP_13.2
S02ratnakeu:2272: atha khalu bhagavān api śākyamunis tathāgata evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2273: vartiṃ merupramāṇāṃ purata iha mune gandhatailāvasiktāṃ
S02ratnakeu:2275: yaḥ kaścit puṇyakāmo nivaraṇatanutāṃ prārthayan yas tv ihānyaḥ
S02ratnakeu:2276: sūtraṃ prakṣīṇakāleṣu sadasi kathayet puṇyam asmād viśiṣṭam // RKP_13.3
S02ratnakeu:2277: atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2278: kṣāntiṃ yaś ca vibhāvayet matidharo vīryaṃ sadā cārabhen
S02ratnakeu:2279: nityaṃ dhyānaparaḥ samāhitatanuḥ prajñāṃ ca visphārayet /
S02ratnakeu:2281: kṣīṇe yas tv iha dhārayet kaliyuge saddharmamudrām imām
S02ratnakeu:2282: eṣā kṣāntir idaṃ ca vīryam asamaṃ prajñā ca tasyātulā // RKP_13.4
S02ratnakeu:2283: atha khalu virajabalavikrāmī tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2285: grāhayitvā parān yuktyā vācayitvā punaḥ sadā // RKP_13.5
S02ratnakeu:2287: yat puṇyaṃ samavāpnoti na tac chakyaṃ prakīrtitum // RKP_13.6
S02ratnakeu:2289: atha khalu te 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavanto 'sya sūtrasyāprameyāṃ varṇaguṇānuśaṃsān udīrayitvā śakrabrahmalokapālān āhūyaivam ūcuḥ //
S02ratnakeu:2290: udgṛhṇīdhvaṃ mārṣā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayaṃkaraṃ yasya paścātkāle śravaṇamātreṇāpi sattvānāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayo bhaviṣyati //
